block.p: In the following reports, the listed at price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent list
Number of bedrooms Number of full bathrooms Number of half bathrooms Weeks on market
*Sale in this price category not available.
450-sq.-ft. alcove studio co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen, dressing area; maintenance $891, 51% tax deductible; listed at $299,000. Brokers: Weichert; Halstead Property.
650-sq.-ft. condo in a 21-year-old building; 24-hr. doormen, marble bath, h/w floors; common charge $783; taxes $7,836; listed at $525,000. Brokers: Regatta; City Connections.

1,030-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, new kitchen and baths, maintenance $1,665, 47% tax deductible; listed at $725,000. Brokers: Coldwell Banker Hunt Kennedy; Prudential Douglas Elliman.
1,500-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated prewar building; 12-ft. ceilings, c/a, h/w floors, north and south exposures; common charge $351; taxes $16,296; listed at $1.2 million. Broker: Citi Habitats.

1,250-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed eat-in kitchen, stainless-steel appliances, river view; maintenance $1,708, 40% tax deductible; listed at $1.35 million. Broker: Corcoran Group.
850-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; part-time doormen, windowed eat-in kitchen, h/w floors; maintenance $548, 50% tax deductible; listed at $250,000. Brokers: Susan E. Goldy; Anita Wolfe.
2,100-sq.-ft. 11-year-old town-house condo; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, c/a, h/w floors; common charge $165; taxes $1,541; listed at $374,900. Broker: Salmon.
57-year-old brick 2-family; primary unit: 3 bedrooms, 1 bath; other unit: 2 bedrooms, 1 bath; finished basement, 25-by-60-ft. lot; taxes $3,712; listed at $799,000. Broker: Century 21 Benjamin.

2 units in a 75-year-old mixed-use brick building; each unit: 2 bedrooms, 1 bath; 1,100-sq.-ft. of commercial space, 26-by-58-ft. lot; taxes $6,200; listed at $1.25 million. Broker: Century 21 Benjamin.
Updated 2-family; primary duplex: 3 bedrooms, 21/2 baths; simplex: 2 bedrooms, 11/2 baths; 20-by-81-ft. lot; taxes $2,600; listed at $1,999,999. Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue.
35-year-old waterfront condo; balcony with water view, boat slip, efficiency kitchen w/dishwasher, w/w carpet; common charge $320; taxes $2,972; listed at $225,000. Broker: Fairfield Realty Services.
60-year-old brick colonial; eat-in kitchen, large living room, den, laundry room, 2-level deck, c/a, pool, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $9,387; listed at $599,000. Broker: Daniel Gale Sotheby's.

77-year-old colonial; living-room fireplace, foyer, den, updated kitchen, breakfast room, c/a, attic, basement, 1-car garage, 75-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $9,467; listed at $829,000. Brokers: Daniel Gale Sotheby's; Carollo.

25-year-old condo; on cul-de-sac, living-room fireplace, 2-story entry, first-floor master suite, community pool and tennis courts; common charge $500; taxes $14,868; listed at $969,000. Broker: Shawn Elliott.

102-year-old colonial; 5 fireplaces, 2-story entry with curving staircase, servants' quarters, sleeping porch, 203-by-199-ft. lot; taxes $16,891; listed at $1.295 million (multiple bids). Broker: Sherlock Homes.

875-sq.-ft. co-op in a 67-year-old garden complex; foyer, galley kitchen, closet built-ins, 3 exposures, terrace; maintenance $664, 45% tax deductible; listed at $239,000. Brokers: Houlihan & O'Malley; Patricia Schiller.
50-year-old ranch; front porch, screened porch, mountain views, 1-car attached garage, 0.24-acre lot; taxes $6,403; listed at $479,900. Prudential Holmes & Kennedy; Premium.

35-year-old contemporary; full-wall stone fireplace in great room, eat-in kitchen, skylights, wraparound deck, 1-car attached garage, 7.44-acre lot; taxes $13,614; listed at $679,000. Broker: Prudential Rand.
94-year-old colonial; front porch, parquet floors, custom built-ins, 3 fireplaces, beamed ceilings, 0.29-acre lot, taxes $25,136; listed at $949,000. Broker: C. S. McClellan.
New colonial; front porch, fireplaces in living and family rooms, eat-in cook's kitchen, high ceilings, 0.21-acre lot; taxes $14,586; listed at $1.595 million. Broker: Coldwell Banker Residential.
39-year-old vinyl-sided ranch; eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, deck, 1-car garage, 137-by-165-ft. lot; taxes $3,671; listed at $275,000. Brokers: Prudential Rand; ADG Classic.
22-year-old brick and cedar high ranch; upgraded appliances, family room, den, h/w floors, deck, 1-car garage, 0.27-acre lot; taxes $7,138; listed at $484,900. Brokers: Prudential Rand; Joyce.

New stone and stucco colonial; granite counters, stainless-steel appliances, 2-story family room, golf course view, 0.49-acre lot; taxes $8,275; listed at $739,000. Brokers: Coldwell Banker New City; Weichert.

37-year-old brick ranch; dock on Round Lake, eat-in kitchen with pantry, family room with fireplace, office, deck, pool, 2-car garage, 1.4-acre lot; listed at $1.07 million. Brokers: Better Homes N.Y.; ARC.

127-year-old Victorian; upgraded appliances, 3 fireplaces, original detail, river view, pool, 0.64-acre lot; taxes $21,559; listed at $1.335 million. Brokers: Keller Williams Hudson Valley; Century 21 Grand.
20-year-old condo; large rooms, 3 custom closets, c/a, 2 garage spaces; common charge $208; taxes $5,640; listed at $334,900. Brokers: Coldwell Banker Jablonski; Prudential McGeehan & Pineiro.

26-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; granite counters, stainless-steel appliances, unfinished full basement, 1-car attached garage; 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,826; listed at $349,000. Brokers: Century 21 Turi; Weichert.

New town-house condo; Manhattan views, cherry floors, custom painted interior, crown moldings, cook's kitchen, 1-car garage; common charge $375; taxes $8,280; listed at $729,000. Broker: Coldwell Banker.
80-year-old colonial; h/w floors, den, 3rd-floor leisure room, living-room fireplace, original detail, c/a; 0.68-acre lot; taxes $24,206; listed at $985,000. Broker: Weichert.
New condo on the 11th floor; doormen, Manhattan and river views, bay windows, den, pantry, gym in building; common charge and taxes to be determined; listed at $1.285 million. Broker: Liberty.
38-year-old wood ranch; eat-in kitchen, living-room fireplace, h/w floors, full basement, new windows, 1-car garage, 0.47-acre lot; taxes $3,427; listed at $259,900. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.

27-year-old wood Cape Cod; granite counters, stainless-steel appliances, living-room fireplace, family room, 2-car garage, 0.24-acre lot; taxes $4,346; listed at $539,000. Broker: Coldwell Banker Greenwich.
35-year-old wood Cape Cod; renovated baths and eat-in kitchen, family room, c/a, deck, 2-car garage, 1.12-acre lot; taxes $9,229; listed at $745,000. Broker: Neumann.

82-year-old wood farmhouse; living room with vaulted ceilings and fireplace, office, walk-in closet, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 0.45-acre lot; taxes $7,960; listed at $999,000. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.

69-year-old stucco traditional; beach and dock rights, family room, library, solarium, 2 fireplaces, h/w floors, 2-car garage, 0.46-acre lot; taxes $15,773; listed at $3.195 million. Broker: Coldwell Banker Curtis.
